subject: Load cell pedals
description_text:
Hi I would like to order your pedals however I am unsure which model is the
latest/best pedals please let me know so I can order ASAP

Thanks, James

conversations.body_text: Hi James McBratney,  Sorry for the late reply, this is our best performing pedal yet.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-sim-pedal-pro-x-ultra?variant=51308303974714
